title: Free Energy Universality of Spherical Spin Glasses
abstract:
We prove the free energy and ground state energy of spherical spin glasses
are universal under the minimal moment assumptions. Previously such
universality was known only for Ising spin glasses and random symmetric
matrices, the latter being a celebrated result of Bai--Yin. Our methods extend
to $\ell^q$ balls for $q>2$, thus resolving a conjecture of Chen-Sen, and to
tensor PCA.
